divs: Sighting Detailsi was leaving from vassar to saginaw at seven pm et when i looked up at sky and a blue and red light in the sky did not think much of it as i kept going it loked like it was pacing me i turned from the south to the west to i loked again the object was behind me i looked 20 seconds later the object was ahead of me i drove to my house looked out my window the object in the south west corner of the sky a small airport is due north of me i have seen helicopters and planes land there iwatch this object stay in that position for a hour a liitle worried now after a hour it moves form ten oclock to twelve o clock position i say if it is a helicopter why is it there why hover for a hour in wrong place i look ten minutes later it is gone wierd.
Summary: SAW STRANGE light in sky over a hour moved position then gone
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around January 30th 2011
